Title: Underground Economics
Description:
After the Day of Darkness, we haven't seen or heard from the earthen. I don't know why.

We used to be on good terms. I'd even have considered Merrix a friend, albeit an odd one. 

We need this to go well.
ObjectivesText: Assist the Arathi with trade negotiations in Dunelle's Kindness.
CompletionText: We need this trade deal to go through.
RewardText:
Flames preserve me. That went better than I had hoped. 

Thank you, once again. You have done us a great service.

Objectives.Text: Convince Andee Seabraid to trade with the Arathi
Convince Teha to Trade with the Arathi
